tr_newAPAdded: Tafiditra ny mpisava lalana mpanampy vaovao
tr_pubApprovedAsAP: Nekena mba hanao mpisava lalana mpanampy ity mpitory ity, ary efa nampidirina ao amin’ny firaketana.
tr_deletePersonConfirmation: Ho esorina ao amin’ny lisitra ny olona ao amin’ny fiangonana ve ity olona ity? Raha manana kaonty Organized izy, dia tsy ho afaka hampiasa an’izany intsony sady tsy ho afaka hiditra ao amin’ny fiangonanareo.
tr_noResultsDesc: Andramo ovaina ny teny karohinao na ny sivana nampiasainao
tr_addTimeAway: Ampidiro ny andro tsy maha eo ianao satria manampy an'ireo rahalahy handamina ny fivoriana izany.
tr_addEmergencyContacts: Ampidiro ny nomerao hahazoana an’ireo solontenanao ao amin’ny “Karatra Momba ny Ra.” Hanampy ny mpiandraikitra ny andia-mpitory izany raha misy zavatra manjo anao.
tr_firstReportDesc: Ny volana voalohany nampidirina ny tatitra ao amin’ny firaketana
tr_congregationPersonsDesc: Bind user profiles with their Organized person records, edit their rights, view the personal invitation code or delegate people by clicking on the profile of a participant.
tr_baptizedAndAppointedDesc: Anti-panahy sy rahalahy neken'ny anti-panahy rehetra ihany no tokony omena zo ho mpandrindra.
tr_publicTalkCoordinator: Mpandrindra an’ireo lahateny ho an’ny besinimaro
tr_midweekStudentStatusDefault: Mpianatra fivoriana andavanandro ity olona ity. Afaka mijery ny fandaharam-pivoriana foana izy noho izany.
tr_publisherStatusDefault: Mpitory ity olona ity. Afaka mijery ny fandaharam-pivoriana sy mandefa tatitra momba ny fanompoana foana izy noho izany.
tr_delegatePersonsDesc: Afaka mijery ny anjara amin’ny fivoriana sy mandefa ny tatitra momba ny fanompoana ho an’ireo olona ireo ny solontenany.
tr_invitationCodeInstruction: To add a new user’s device, generate the invitation code, and ask them to open organized-app.com. Next, they should select their user type and enter the invitation code when prompted.
tr_terminateSessionAdminDesc: Afaka mampiasa ny fitaovany ilay olona mandra-pamarananao ny fidirany ao amin’io fitaovana io. Mila omena kaody fidirana vaovao indray ilay olona raha izay raha mbola hampiasa Organized. Rehefa tena ilaina na mampiahiahy hoe misy olon-kafa mampiasa ny kaontiny no tsara ampiasaina ity.
tr_baptizedBrotherUserDesc: Mpitory vita batisa ity rahalaha ity. Afaka mijery ny fandaharam-pivoriana sy mandefa tatitra momba ny fanompoana foana izy noho izany. Afaka omenao andraikitra hafa koa izy eto ambany.
tr_appAdminRoleDesc: Manana andraikitra feno amin’ny programa Organized sy manome fanampiana ny hafa
tr_coordinatorRoleDesc: Manana andraikitra feno amin’ny programa Organized, anisan’izany ny manome na manaisotra andraikitra ananan’ny hafa
tr_secretaryRoleDesc: Afaka mandritra ny tatitry ny fiangonana, anisan’izany ny fanompoana, isan’ny mpanatrika fivoriana, sy tatitra hafa
tr_serviceOverseerRoleDesc: Afaka mijery ny tatitra momba ny fanompoan’ireo mpitory, ny faritanin’ny fiangonana, ary ny fandaharam-pitoriana
tr_serviceGroupOverseerRoleDesc: Afaka mijery ny tatitry ny mpitory ao amin’ny andiany misy azy, ny fandaharam-pitoriana ataon’izy ireo, ary faritanin’ny fiangonana
tr_serviceGroupOverseerOrAssistantRole: Mpiandraikitry ny andiam-pitory na ny mpanampy aza
tr_deleteInvitationCodeDesc: Raha fafanao io kaody io, dia tsy ho afaka hiditra amin’ny fitaovana vaovao intsony ity olona ity. Mila mamorona kaody vaovao sy manome an’izany an’ilay olona ianao, raha mila miditra amin’ny kaontiny indray izy.
tr_deleteUserProfileDesc:
Tianao hofafana ve ny kaonty Organized ampiasain’io olona io? Hifafa daholo ny rakitra ao amin’ny fitaovana ampiasainy rehefa miditra ao amin’ilay programa izy.

Na mifafa aza anefa ny kaontiny, dia mbola tavela ao amin’ny lisitry ny olona ao amin’ny fiangonana ny anarany.
tr_publicWitnessingScheduling: Fandaharana fitoriana amin’ny toerana be olona
tr_coVisitScheduling: Fandaharana ny fitsidihan’ny Mpiandraikitra ny Faritra
tr_addNewOrganizedUserDesc: Anontanio any amin’ilay rahalahy ny adiresy email nampiasainy rehefa namorona kaonty Organized izy. Iny ampiasaina avy eo mba hampidirina azy ao amin’ny fiangonanareo, dia ampifandraiso amin’ny olona ao amin’ny fiangonana ny kaontiny.
tr_noUserError: Tsy misy kaonty hita mifandray amin’io email io
tr_userFoundSuccess: User found! Set up his user profile and rights
tr_addNewPublisherDesc: Misafidiana olona iray ao amin’ny lisitra ny olona ao amin’ny fiangonanareo mba hamoronana ny kaody fidirana ho azy.
tr_inviteUserDesc: Omeo an’ilay olona ilay kaody eo ambany mba hanomezana alalana azy hampiasa Organized. Azo jerena ao amin’ny pejy misy ny mombamomba ny kaontiny koa ity kaody ity.
tr_congregationSettingsDesc: Mihatra amin’ny fiangonana iray manontolo ny fanamboarana eto ambany
tr_displayNameMeetingDesc: “R. Ndimby” no ampiasaina fa tsy “Rakotoson Ndimby.” Mbola azo jerena ato amin’ny Organized ny anarana feno
tr_exactDatesOnMidweekMeetings: Hampiasa ny daty tena hivoriana amin’ny fandaharana
tr_exactDatesOnMidweekMeetingsDesc: Display exact meeting dates instead of Monday's date
tr_useDisplayNameMeeting: Use display names on meeting schedules
tr_useDisplayNameOthers: Use display names on other schedules
tr_useDisplayNameOthersDesc: Useful for duties or cleaning schedules with a lot of content. Try and see which option works better
tr_recordOnlineAttendance: Hirakitra ny isan’ny olona manatrika fivoriana amin’ny internet
tr_recordOnlineAttendanceDesc: Lasa misy hoe “Internet” rehefa hampiditra ny isan’ny mpanatrika
tr_kingdomHallAddressDesc: Ampidiro ny adiresy mba ho fantatry ny mpandahateny mpitsidika ny toerana
tr_autoAssignOpeningPrayer: Atao mitovy ny mpitari-draharaha sy ny vavaka fanokafana
tr_autoAssignClosingPrayer: Atao mitovy ny mpitari-draharaha sy ny vavaka famaranana
tr_assignAuxCounserlorDesc: One brother will be responsible by default. Another brother can be manually assigned if needed.
tr_langGroupsDesc: Afaka mamorona antokom-pitory maromaro ao amin’ny fiangonana ianao mba ho afaka hiara-hiasa tsara ianareo.
tr_langGroupEnableDesc: Atao afaka hamoronana antokom-pitory ato amin’ny fiangonana
tr_congregationEncryptionDesc: Tehirizo tsara ity kaody ity. Ampiasaina mba hiarovana ny rakitra ampiasain’ny fiangonanareo ato amin’ny Organized izy ireo. Raha very izany, dia tsy maintsy mamorona fiangonanareo indray ianao. Jereo ato hoe ahoana no hiarovanay ny rakitra ampiasainao.
tr_circuitOverseerSettingDesc: Hampiasaina amin’ny fandaharana ny anarana eto ambany. Hiseho any amin’ny pejy tokony hisy azy kosa ny datin’ny fitsidihana manaraka mba ho hitan’ireo mpitory.
tr_autoApprovePublicMinistry: Ekena avy hatrany ny fangatahana hanompo amin’ny toerana be olona
tr_autoApprovePublicMinistryDesc: Ekena avy hatrany ny fangatahana tsirairay. Mila fitandremana tsara ny fampiasana azy ity
tr_autoApproveTerritoryRequests: Ekena avy hatrany ny fangatahana faritany
tr_autoApproveTerritoryRequestsDesc: Ekena avy hatrany ny fangatahana faritany alefan’ny mpitory raha tsy misy mampiasa ilay izy
tr_notifyOverdue: Handefa fampatsiahivana ho an’ny mpitory raha tara ny fiasana faritany
tr_sendOverdueNotificationDesc: Handefa fampahatsiahivana raha ela loatra ny fiasana ny faritany
tr_enablePublicLinks: Hampiasa rohy amin’ny pejy azon’ny besinimaro jerena
tr_enablePublicLinksDesc: Safidio ny pejy tianao zaraina amin’ny alalan’ny rohy ho an’ireo tsy manana kaonty Organized.
tr_coVisitSchedules: Fandaharana amin’ny fitsidihan’ny Mpiandraikitra ny Faritra
tr_meetingDutiesSchedules: Fandaharana misy ny andraikitra hafa amin’ny fivoriana
tr_newLangGroupCreatedSuccess: Vita soa aman-tsara ny famoronana ny antokom-pitory
tr_newLangGroupCreatedSuccessDesc: {{ LanguageGroupName }} is ready for setup and can be accessed from the Home page by administrators and group members
tr_addNewLangGroupDesc: Ampidiro ny anaran’ilay antokom-pitory, ary safidio ny fiteny ampiasainy. Raha mbola tsy hita ato amin’ny Organized, dia mifandraisa aminay mba hahafahana mampiditra an’izany ao amin’ity programa ity.
tr_addNewLangGroupMembersDesc: Ampidiro hoe iza avy no ao amin’ilay antokom-pitory, ary misafidiana rahalahy iray fara fahakeliny mba handrindra an’ilay antokom-pitory ato amin’ny Organized. Tokony ho efa ao amin’ny lisitr’ireo mpandrindra ny programa ao amin’ny fiangonana io rahalahy io.
tr_newServiceGroupCreatedSuccess: Vita ny fanamboarana ny andiam-pitory vaovao
tr_deleteServiceGroupDesc: Tianao fafanao ve ity andiany ity? Mila tendrenao amin’ny andiany hafa indray ireo mpitory ao anatiny avy eo.
tr_createNewGroupDesc: Arakaraka ny filahatry ny andiany eo amin’ny lisitra ny nomeraony. Azonao omena anarana koa anefa ilay andiany raha izay no ampiasaina ao amin’ny fiangonanareo, ohatra hoe ny toerana misy azy ireo. Safidio koa hoe iza no mpiandraikitra sy mpanampy.
tr_createNewGroupLastStep: Ampidiro ny mpitory tokony ho amin’ny andiany. Mbola azonao ovaina ihany ireo fanazavana ireo avy raha ilaina.
tr_markDisqualifiedDesc: Tsy afaka omena anjara amin’ny fivoriana ny olona tsy mahafeno fepetra.
tr_timeAwayAddedSuccess: Tafiditra ny andro tsy maha eo
tr_timeAwayAddedSuccessDesc: Misaotra betsaka nanavao ny fotoana ahafahanao
tr_appointSubsisuteSpeaker: Appoint a substitution for visiting speakers
tr_displayWSConductorSubstitutions: Aseho amin’ny fandaharana ny mpitarika ny fianarana ny Tilikambo Fiambenana mpisolo toerana
tr_displayWSConductorDesc: Amin’ny fotoana tsy maha eo ny mpitarika ny fianarana na raha marary izy
tr_repeatedMonthlyWarning: Hampiseho ny fampahafantarana anjara miverina ao anatin’ny volana
tr_repeatedMonthlyWarningDesc: Efa manana anjara io olona io amin'ity volana ity
tr_discoverableSetting: Atao azo karohina ao amin’ny Organized ny fiangonanareo
tr_discoverableSettingDesc: Avela hahita ny fiangonanareo ao amin’ny Organized ny fiangonana hafa. Azon’izy ireo karohina ny anarana na ny nomerao, ary afaka mandefa fangatahana hijery ny lisitra ny mpandahateny mpitsidika izy ireo avy eo
tr_noSpeakersYet: No outgoing speakers yet. Add them by editing your list.
tr_noCongregationsYetInfo: Tsy mbola nanampy fiangonana ianao. Mampidira vaovao mba hahitana ny lisitry ny mpandahateny ao amin’izy ireo. Azo tendrena rehefa manao fandaharana izy ireo avy eo.
tr_addOrganizedCongregationDesc: Tsy hitanao ve ny fiangonana tianao tadiavina? Ataovy azo antoka navelan’izy ireo ho hitan’ny fiangonana hafa mampiasa Organized izy. Rehefa vitan’izy ireo izany izay vao afaka mandefa fangatahana hijery ny lisitry ny mpandahateny mpitsidika any amin’izy ireo ianao.
tr_addManualCongregationDesc: Hanampy fiangonana tsy mbola mampiasa Organized. Rehefa mampiasa ilay programa izy ireo any aoriana, dia azonao ampifanitsiana amin’ny lisitra ananany izay namboarinao.
tr_attendanceRecordAdded: Tafiditra ny tatitry ny isan’ny mpanatrika
tr_attendanceRecordAddedDesc: Mandeha ho azy ny fikajiana ny tontaliny sy ny antsalany, ary toy izany koa ny tatitra isam-bolana
tr_markToBranchOffice: Marihina hoe nalefa any amin’ny biraon’ny sampana
tr_markToBranchOfficeDesc: You’re about to mark this report as submitted to the branch office. Are you sure to continue?
tr_branchOfficeReportMonthsDesc: Tsy mbola namboarina io tatitra io. Raha te hahita ny tsipiriany sy handefa azy io, dia amboary aloha ilay izy.
tr_s1Report: Tatitra Momba ny Fanompoan’ny Fiangonana sy Isan’ny Mpanatrika Fivoriana (S-1)
tr_baptizedUnbaptizedError: Tsy afaka ovaina ho tsy vita batisa izay efa vita batisa.
tr_baptizedMidweekStudentError: Tsy afaka ovaina ho mpianatra fivoriana andavanandro izay efa vita batisa.
tr_unBaptizedMidweekStudentError: Tsy afaka ovaina ho mpianatra fivoriana andavanandro izay tsy mbola vita batisa.
tr_baptizedActiveMultiple: Misy firaketana mihoatra ny iray mbola miasa ao amin’ilay hoe mpitory vita batisa. Ataovy azo antoka hoe iray ihany no miasa.
tr_unbaptizedActiveMultiple: Misy firaketana mihoatra ny iray mbola miasa ao amin’ilay hoe mpitory tsy vita batisa. Ataovy azo antoka hoe iray ihany no miasa.
tr_midweekActiveMultiple: Misy firaketana mihoatra ny iray mbola miasa ao amin’ilay hoe mpianatra fivoriana andavanandro. Ataovy azo antoka hoe iray ihany no miasa.
tr_baptizedInvalidRecords: Tsy mpitory vita batisa ity olona ity nefa misy firaketana mbola miasa ao amin’io sokajy io. Asio daty nifaranana izany na azonao fafana ihany koa.
tr_unbaptizedInvalidRecords: Tsy mpitory tsy vita batisa ity olona ity nefa misy firaketana mbola miasa ao amin’io sokajy io. Asio daty nifaranana izany na azonao fafana ihany koa.
tr_midweekInvalidRecords: Tsy mpianatra fivoriana andavanandro ity olona ity nefa misy firaketana mbola miasa ao amin’io sokajy io. Asio daty nifaranana izany na azonao fafana ihany koa.
tr_privilegesActiveMultiple: Misy firaketana maromaro mbola miasa ao amin’ilay hoe lafiny ara-panahy. Ataovy azo antoka hoe iray ihany no ananan’ny olona izao.
tr_enrollemntsActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found for the enrollments. Make sure that previous records have the end date.
tr_personAddedDesc: Vita ny fampidirina ao amin’ny lisitra ny olona ao amin’ny fiangonana
tr_personDeletedDesc: Raha voafafa tsy nahy izy, dia avereno ampidirina indray
tr_userDeletedDesc: Tsy manana kaonty hidirana ao amin’ny fiangonana intsony i {{ UserName }}
tr_markQualifiedDesc: Afaka omena anjara amin’ny fivoriana indray izy izao.
tr_personTimeAwayDesc: Tsy mbola misy fotoana tsy maha eo nampidirina. Ataovy azo antoka hoe marina tsara foana ity fanazavana ity fa ho ampiasaina ireo rehefa manamboatra fandaharam-pivoriana.
tr_personEmergencyDesc: Ampidiro ny nomerao hahazoana an’ireo solontenanao ao amin’ny “Karatra Momba ny Ra.” Hanampy ny mpiandraikitra ny andia-mpitory izany raha misy zavatra manjo anao.
tr_showTimeAwayToAllUsers: Show time away to all users
tr_allowAllUsersToViewTheTimeDesc: Allow all users to view the time away of other publishers. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_noPersonsAddedDesc: Tsindrio ilay Hanampy olona raha hampiditra olona vaovao dia fenoy ny fanazavana mombamomba azy. Hanamora kokoa ny fanamboarana fandaharana sy fanaovana tatitra izany.
tr_searchResultsNoneDesc: Andramo ovana ny teny karohinao na ny sivana ampiasaina. Jereo koa sao misy diso fanoratra.
tr_personRecordExists: Efa misy ao amin’ny lisitra ity olona ity.
tr_publicTalkAddSongs: Hampiditra hira ho an’ity lahateny ity
tr_publicTalkAddSongsDesc: Ampidiro eto ny hira efa nosafidian’ilay mpandahateny ho an’ity lahateny ity. Hanampy anao amin’ny fanamboarana fandaharana izany.
tr_speakerTalksSongsDesc: Eto ianao no afaka manova ny hira amin’ireo lahateny ataon’ity mpandahateny ity.
tr_outgoingSpeakersHide: Hide your congregation from other congregations on Organized?
tr_outgoingSpeakersHideDesc:
Other congregations using Organized won’t be able to find your congregation and request your speakers list anymore. You can make it visible again later at any time.

Congregations that already have access to your speakers list will keep it, unless you manually revoke their access.
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccess: Congregations granted access to your outgoing speakers list
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccessNoneDesc: No congregations have access to your outgoing speakers list yet. To allow other congregations to find yours and send a request, make sure your congregation is discoverable in Organized.
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccessActiveDesc: The following congregations can view your outgoing speakers list and contact information of your congregation provided by you.
tr_congregationDetailsDesc: Fill out the necessary contact info and address for this congregation to share with your outgoing speakers.
tr_incomingCongregationNoSpeakers: No visiting speakers yet. Edit the congregation list to start adding speakers and their talks.
tr_selectPersonError: You must select a person record to bind it with the user profile
tr_congregationSecurityDesc: In Organized, your privacy and security are top priority. The app has several layers of protection in place. Two important ones are the ‘Congregation access code’ and the ‘Congregation master key’. They keep congregation data safely encrypted and allow only authorized users to access it. Learn more about these and other security features.
tr_congregationMasterKeyDesc: This code is essential for securely accessing congregation data, including congregation and ministry reports, the persons list, and other information only available to appointed brothers. It's the most important code – losing it could result in losing all congregation data.
tr_congregationAccessCodeDesc: This is your congregation's unique code for connecting new users or logging in. It's used to encrypt congregation data for all users.
tr_createMasterKeyIntroDesc: This key securely encrypts your congregation's data, including reports and persons, and is required for administrative actions such as data export/import or making significant changed to settings.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlineNoSpeakers: This congregation does not have any visiting speakers yet added to their records. If necessary, you can personally contact them.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlinePending: This congregation did not yet approve your request to access their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can personally contact them.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlineDisapproved: This congregation rejected your request to access their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can contact them personally.
tr_congregationRequestRejectedDesc: The {{ congregationNameAndNumber }} congregation rejected your request to view their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can contact them personally.
tr_congregationAccessRevokeDesc: Revoke access to your speakers list for {{ congregationName }} congregation? They won't be able to see it anymore, but you can share it with them again later if they make a new request.
tr_noGroupsYet: You don’t have any field service groups created yet. Create a group first to start adding publishers and reordering groups.
tr_autoCheckUpdateDesc: Automatically import meeting materials from jw.org at your selected interval
tr_groupRemoveConfirm: Do you want to remove the publisher from the Group {{ group }}?
tr_showOutgoingToAll: Show outgoing speakers schedule to all users
tr_showOutgoingToAllDesc: Allow all users to view the outgoing talks schedule. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_showAwayToAllDesc: Allow all users to view the time away of other publishers. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_showAwayToAll: Show time away to all users
tr_masterKeyChangeDesc: We advise changing the code only if unauthorized access to it is suspected. After creating a new code, securely note and share it only with the appointed brothers who need it.
tr_settingsAutoSaved: All settings adjustments are saved automatically
tr_bindUserRecordAssignmentsNotice: To view your upcoming assignments, make sure first that your device is connected to the internet. Then open the Manage access page to locate your user account and bind it with a record from your congregation persons list.
tr_quickSettingsDesc: Easily update your settings for this page on-the-go. These settings are synced with the congregation settings page, so you can manage them from either location at any time.
tr_upcomingEventsEmpty: The upcoming events list is empty for now. Once elders add new events, they will appear here.
tr_enableCongregationDataSyncDesc: This option will allow your congregation to share the Organized data. It will be possible also to sync data between multiple devices.
tr_applicationRejectedDesc: This application has been rejected. Inform the publisher about its status.
